subject: Re: [junit] JUnit timeout question
msgSnippet: Marcelo, This is not a global timeout in JUnit.  What runner are you using? David Saff On Sun, Apr 12, 2009 at 11:45 AM, marcelo_javier_ruiz
messageBody:
Marcelo,

This is not a global timeout in JUnit. What runner are you using?

David Saff

On Sun, Apr 12, 2009 at 11:45 AM, marcelo_javier_ruiz
<marcelo_javier_ruiz@...> wrote:
> Hi All,
> I need to run some long multithreaded load tests with JUnit, but I find the tests fail before completion at exactly 1200 seconds. Is this a global timeout JUnit has? I'm annotating the test with @Test(timeout = xxxxx) to try to bypass this restriction, but it's not working.
> Any suggestions to make this work?
> Thanks a lot,
> Marcelo.
>
>
